synopsis.text: After vanquishing the Spirit of the Sacrea, Ange finds herself stranded in the Seijuu Universe with no way back to her own. The Queen of the Seijuu Universe, responsible for maintaining the balance of nine Sacrea, has mysteriously vanished, leaving the universe in peril. To restore stability and find a way home, Ange must embark on a mission to awaken the nine Sacrea Guardians and free the Queen from the clutches of the Sacrea spirit. But persuading these men to abandon their lives and protect another is no easy feat. Can the Legendary Etoile rise to the challenge and save the Seijuu Universe? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
